sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_15cdde530f5d130097f2409ce1050e33
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.TranslationWrite</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>TranslationWrite</name><script><![CDATA[var TranslationWrite = Class.create();
TranslationWrite.prototype = {
    
	_log: new GSLog("com.domaners.instance_translation.log", this.type),
	
	initialize: function(languageRec) {
		this.languageRec = languageRec;
    },
	
	createTranslatedRecords: function() {
		
		var ts = new GlideRecord("u_translation_string");
		ts.addQuery("u_language", this.languageRec.sys_id);
		ts.addQuery("u_choice_action", "create");
		ts.addNotNullQuery("u_translated_value");
		ts.addNullQuery("u_target_record");
		ts.query();
		while (ts.next()) {
			if (ts.u_source_table == "sys_ui_message")
				this.createMessage(ts);
			else if (ts.u_source_table == "sys_choice")
				this.createChoice(ts);
			else if (ts.u_source_table == "sys_translated_text")
				this.createTranslatedText(ts);
			else if (ts.u_source_table == "sys_documentation")
				this.createFieldLabel(ts);
			else if (ts.u_source_table == "")
				this.createTranslatedNameField(ts);
			else if(ts.u_source_field_name == "")
				this.createMessageFromScript(ts);
			else
				this.createTranslatedText(ts);	
		}
		
	},
	
	createFieldLabel: function(translatedString) {
		var oldLabel = new GlideRecord("sys_documentation");
		oldLabel.get(translatedString.u_source_record + '');
		
		var newLabel = new GlideRecord("sys_documentation");
		newLabel.initialize();
		newLabel.name = oldLabel.name;
		newLabel.element = oldLabel.element;
		newLabel.label = translatedString.u_translated_value + '';
		newLabel.plural = translatedString.u_translated_field_label_plural + '';
		newLabel.language = translatedString.u_language.u_language_code;
		newLabel.sys_scope = oldLabel.sys_scope;
		newLabel.help = translatedString.u_translated_field_label_help + '';
		newLabel.hint = translatedString.u_translated_field_label_hint + '';
		newLabel.url = translatedString.u_translated_field_label_url + '';
		newLabel.url_target = translatedString.u_translated_field_label_url_target + '';
		var newFieldLabelID = newLabel.insert();
		
		translatedString.u_target_table = "sys_documentation";
		translatedString.u_target_record = newFieldLabelID;
		translatedString.update();
	},
	
	createMessageFromScript: function(translatedString) {
		var newMessage = new GlideRecord("sys_ui_message");
		newMessage.initialize();
		newMessage.message = translatedString.u_translated_value + '';
		newMessage.language = translatedString.u_language.u_language_code;
		newMessage.key = translatedString.u_source_value;
		// newMessage.application = oldMessage.application;
		// newMessage.sys_scope = oldMessage.sys_scope;
		var newMessageID = newMessage.insert();
		
		translatedString.u_target_table = "sys_ui_message";
		translatedString.u_target_record = newMessageID;
		translatedString.update();
	},
	
	createMessage: function(translatedString) {
		
		var oldMessage = new GlideRecord("sys_ui_message");
		oldMessage.get(translatedString.u_source_record + '');
		
		var newMessage = new GlideRecord("sys_ui_message");
		newMessage.initialize();
		newMessage.message = translatedString.u_translated_value + '';
		newMessage.language = translatedString.u_language.u_language_code;
		newMessage.key = oldMessage.key;
		newMessage.application = oldMessage.application;
		newMessage.sys_scope = oldMessage.sys_scope;
		var newMessageID = newMessage.insert();
		
		translatedString.u_target_table = "sys_ui_message";
		translatedString.u_target_record = newMessageID;
		translatedString.update();
		
	},
	
	createTranslatedNameField: function(translatedString) {
		// That's Numberwang
	},
	
	createTranslatedText: function(translatedString) {
		
		var newText = new GlideRecord("sys_translated_text");
		newText.initialize();
		if(translatedString.u_source_table == "sys_translated_text") {
			var oldText = new GlideRecord("sys_translated_text");
			oldText.get(translatedString.u_source_record);
			newText.tablename = oldText.tablename;
			newText.documentkey = oldText.documentkey;
			newText.fieldname = oldText.fieldname;
		} else {
			newText.tablename = translatedString.u_source_table;
			newText.documentkey = translatedString.u_source_record;
			newText.fieldname = translatedString.u_source_field_name + '';
		}
		newText.language = translatedString.u_language.u_language_code;
		newText.value = translatedString.u_translated_value + '';
		var newTextID = newText.insert();
		
		translatedString.u_target_table = "sys_translated_text";
		translatedString.u_target_record = newTextID;
		translatedString.update();
		
	},
	
	createChoice: function(translatedString) {
		
		var oldChoice = new GlideRecord("sys_choice");
		oldChoice.get(translatedString.u_source_record + '');
		
		var newChoice = new GlideRecord("sys_choice");
		newChoice.initialize();
		newChoice.label = translatedString.u_translated_value + '';
		newChoice.language = translatedString.u_language.u_language_code;
		newChoice.hint = oldChoice.hint; // STUB: HOW TO HANDLE THIS?
		newChoice.name = oldChoice.name;
		newChoice.element = oldChoice.element;
		newChoice.value = oldChoice.value;
		newChoice.dependent_value = oldChoice.dependent_value;
		newChoice.sequence = oldChoice.sequence;
		newChoice.inactive = oldChoice.inactive;
		var newChoiceID = newChoice.insert();
		
		translatedString.u_target_table = "sys_choice";
		translatedString.u_target_record = newChoiceID;
		translatedString.update();
		
	},

    type: 'TranslationWrite'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-04-11 15:34:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>15cdde530f5d130097f2409ce1050e33</sys_id><sys_mod_count>22</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TranslationWrite</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_15cdde530f5d130097f2409ce1050e33</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-12 09:57:29</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fix_5878651f0fee130097f2409ce1050eb6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><before>false</before><description/><flush_cache>false</flush_cache><name>translateAll</name><run_once>true</run_once><script><![CDATA[translateAll();

function translateAll() {
	
	var t =  new GlideRecord("u_translation_string");
	t.addEncodedQuery("u_language=761cac970fe6130097f2409ce1050efd^u_source_valueISNOTEMPTY^u_translated_valueISEMPTY");
	t.query();
	while(t.next()) {
		var translatedValue = new DMNSYandexTranslate(t).getTranslatedString();
		if(translatedValue != "") {
			t.u_translated_value = translatedValue;
			t.update();
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-12 15:02:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>5878651f0fee130097f2409ce1050eb6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>translateAll</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_5878651f0fee130097f2409ce1050eb6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-12 15:18:59</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_78281ab40f52130097f2409ce1050e64
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DMNSLanguageUtils</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>DMNSLanguageUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var DMNSLanguageUtils = Class.create();
DMNSLanguageUtils.prototype = {
    
	initialize: function(language) {
		this.language = language;
    },
	
	createChoiceOption: function() {
		
		if(!this.hasExistingTranslationChoice()) {
			var newChoice = new GlideRecord("sys_choice");
			newChoice.initialize();
			newChoice.name = "sys_user";
			newChoice.language = "en";
			newChoice.element = "preferred_language";
			newChoice.inactive = false;
			newChoice.label = this.language.u_name;
			newChoice.value = this.language.u_language_code + '';
			newChoice.insert();
		}
	},
	
	hasExistingTranslationChoice: function() {
		var ch = new GlideRecord("sys_choice");
		ch.addQuery("name", "sys_user");
		ch.addQuery("language", "en");
		ch.addQuery("element", "preferred_language");
		ch.addQuery("inactive", false);
		ch.addQuery("value", this.language.u_language_code + '');
		ch.query();
		return ch.hasNext();
	},
	
	disableTranslationUserOption: function() {
		var ch = new GlideRecord("sys_choice");
		ch.addQuery("name", "sys_user");
		ch.addQuery("element", "preferred_language");
		ch.addQuery("inactive", false);
		ch.addQuery("value", this.language.u_language_code + '');
		ch.query();
		while(ch.next()) {
			ch.inactive = true;
			ch.update();
		}
	},
	
    type: 'DMNSLanguageUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-23 13:55:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>78281ab40f52130097f2409ce1050e64</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DMNSLanguageUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_78281ab40f52130097f2409ce1050e64</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-24 10:29:02</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_4b835d130fee130097f2409ce1050ee8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DMNSYandexTranslate</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>DMNSYandexTranslate</name><script><![CDATA[var DMNSYandexTranslate = Class.create();
DMNSYandexTranslate.prototype = {
    
	initialize: function(current) {
		this.current = current;
	},
	
	getTranslatedString: function() {
		var yandexApiKey = gs.getProperty("dmns.translate.yandex.api_key");
		
		var rest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2("Yandex Translate", "GET");
		rest.setStringParameterNoEscape("api_key", yandexApiKey);
		rest.setStringParameterNoEscape("source_text", encodeURI(this.current.u_source_value));
		rest.setStringParameterNoEscape("target_lang", this.current.u_language.u_language_code);
		
		try {
			response = rest.execute();
		} catch(e) {
			return e;
		}
		
		var responseBody = JSON.parse(response.getBody());
		var translatedValue = responseBody.text[0];
		
		return translatedValue;
		
	},

    type: 'DMNSYandexTranslate'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-12 13:40:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>4b835d130fee130097f2409ce1050ee8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DMNSYandexTranslate</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4b835d130fee130097f2409ce1050ee8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-12 14:15:24</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_3f458a530f1d130097f2409ce1050ee7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.TranslationQuery</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>TranslationQuery</name><script><![CDATA[var TranslationQuery = Class.create();
TranslationQuery.prototype = {
    
	_log: new GSLog("com.domaners.instance_translation.log", this.type),
	
	initialize: function(languageRec) {
		this.languageRec = languageRec;
    },
	
	getTranslations: function() {
		
		var arrayUtil = new ArrayUtil();
		
		var translationArray = this.getMessages();
		translationArray = arrayUtil.union(translationArray, this.getSysChoices());
		translationArray = arrayUtil.union(translationArray, this.getFieldLabels());
		translationArray = arrayUtil.union(translationArray, this.getTranslatedTexts());
		translationArray = arrayUtil.union(translationArray, this.getTranslatedNameFields());
		translationArray = arrayUtil.union(translationArray, this.getTranslatableFields());
		translationArray = arrayUtil.union(translationArray, this.combScriptsForMessages());
		
		this._log.debug("translationArray length: " + translationArray.length);
		
		for(var key in translationArray) {
			this._createTranslationString(translationArray[key]);
			if(key % 1000 == 0)
				this._log.debug(key + " strings added.");
		}
		
	},
	
	getTranslatableFields: function() {
		
		var fieldArray = [];
		
		var dict = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
		dict.addActiveQuery();
		dict.addQuery("internal_type", "IN", "translated,translated_field,translated_html,translated_text");
		dict.query();
		while(dict.next()) {
			var gr = new GlideRecord(dict.name + '');
			gr.addNotNullQuery(dict.element + '');
			gr.query();
			while(gr.next()) {
				fieldArray.push({
					'u_source_value': gr.getValue(dict.element + '') + '',
					'u_source_table': dict.name + '',
					'u_source_record': gr.sys_id + '',
					'u_source_field_name': dict.element + '',
					'u_language': this.languageRec.sys_id + ''
				});
			}
		}
		
		return fieldArray;
		
	},
	
	getFieldLabels: function() {
		
		var labelArray = [];
		
		var label = new GlideRecord("sys_documentation");
		label.addQuery("language", this.languageRec.u_source_language + '');
		label.query();
		while(label.next()) {
			labelArray.push({
				'u_source_value': label.label + '',
				'u_source_table': 'sys_documentation',
				'u_source_record': label.sys_id + '',
				'u_language': this.languageRec.sys_id + ''
			});
		}
		
		return labelArray;
		
	},
	
	getTranslatedNameFields: function() {
		
		var nameFieldArray = [];
		
		var nameField = new GlideRecord("sys_translated");
		nameField.addQuery("language", this.languageRec.u_source_language + '');
		nameField.query();
		while(nameField.next()) {
			nameFieldArray.push({
				'u_source_value': nameField.label + '',
				'u_source_table': 'sys_translated',
				'u_source_record': nameField.sys_id + '',
				'u_language': this.languageRec.sys_id + ''
			});
		}
		
		return nameFieldArray;
		
	},
	
	getTranslatedTexts: function() {
		
		var textArray = [];
		
		var text = new GlideRecord("sys_translated_text");
		text.addQuery("language", this.languageRec.u_source_language + '');
		text.query();
		while(text.next()) {
			textArray.push({
				'u_source_value': text.label + '',
				'u_source_table': 'sys_translated_text',
				'u_source_record': text.sys_id + '',
				'u_language': this.languageRec.sys_id + ''
			});
		}
		
		return textArray;
		
	},
	
	getSysChoices: function() {
		
		var choiceArray = [];
		
		var choice = new GlideRecord("sys_choice");
		choice.addQuery("language", this.languageRec.u_source_language + '');
		choice.query();
		while(choice.next()) {
			choiceArray.push({
				'u_source_value': choice.label + '',
				'u_source_table': 'sys_choice',
				'u_source_record': choice.sys_id + '',
				'u_language': this.languageRec.sys_id + ''
			});
		}
		
		return choiceArray;
		
	},
	
	getMessages: function() {
		
		var msgArray = [];
		
		var msg = new GlideRecord("sys_ui_message");
		msg.addQuery("language", this.languageRec.u_source_language + '');
		msg.query();
		while(msg.next()) {
			msgArray.push({
				'u_source_value': msg.message + '',
				'u_source_table': 'sys_ui_message',
				'u_source_record': msg.sys_id + '',
				'u_language': this.languageRec.sys_id + ''
			});
		}
		
		return msgArray;
		
	},

	_createTranslationString: function(obj) {
		
		var ts = new GlideRecord("u_translation_string");
		ts.initialize();
		for(var key in obj) {
			ts.setValue(key, obj[key]);
		}
		ts.insert();
		
	},
	
	deleteAllSourceTranslations: function() {
		
		var ts = new GlideRecord("u_translation_string");
		ts.addQuery("u_language", this.languageRec.sys_id + '');
		ts.addNullQuery("u_translated_value");
		ts.deleteMultiple();
		
	},
	
	combScriptsForMessages: function() {
		var scriptFields = [], msgArray = [];
		var regex = /getMessage\((["'])(?:(?=(\\?))\2.)*?\1\)/g;

		var dict = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
		dict.addEncodedQuery("active=true^internal_type=script^ORinternal_type=xml^nameNOT LIKEvar__m_");
		dict.query();
		while(dict.next()) {
			scriptFields.push({
				name: dict.element + '',
				table: dict.name + ''
			});
		}

		for(var sKey in scriptFields) {
			var script = scriptFields[sKey];
			var gr = new GlideRecord(script.table);
			gr.addActiveQuery();
			gr.addQuery(script.name, "CONTAINS", "getMessage(");
			gr.query();

			while(gr.next()) {
				var scriptStr = gr.getValue(script.name) + '';
				var messages = String(scriptStr.match(regex)).split(",");
				var dupeCheckArr = [];

				for(var mKey in messages) {
					var message = messages[mKey] + '';
					message = message.replace("getMessage('", "").replace('getMessage("', '').replace("')", "").replace('")', '');
					if(dupeCheckArr.indexOf(message) == -1 && message != null) {
						msgArray.push({
							'u_source_value': message + '',
							'u_source_table': script.table,
							'u_source_record': gr.sys_id + '',
							'u_language': this.languageRec.sys_id + ''
						});
						dupeCheckArr.push(message);
					}
				}
			}
		}
		return msgArray;
	},

    type: 'TranslationQuery'

function createTranslationDefinitions() {
	
	var translationQuery = new TranslationQuery(current);

	current.update();
